definitions.definition: One who grinds something, such as the teeth.
Any of various machines or devices that grind things, such as by grinding them down or grinding them up .

subdefinitions.definition: Any of various power tools with a spinning abrasive disc, used for smoothing, shaping, or deburring materials, usually metal .
A grinding machine : any of various machine tools for grinding (either heavy or light grinding, but precise either way).
Any of various pieces of heavy equipment for grinding.

definitions.definition: A submarine sandwich , a sandwich made on a long, cylindrical roll.
examples: I am going to the deli to get a grinder for lunch.

subdefinitions.definition: In particular, a submarine sandwich (hoagie) that is toasted or baked and typically does not contain lettuce.

definitions.definition: A kitchen gadget for processing coffee, herbs etc. into small or powdered pieces.
The restless flycatcher ( Myiagra inquieta ) of Australia , which makes a noise like a scissors grinder.
A fan or performer of grindcore music .
A biohacker who uses cybernetic implants or biochemicals to enhance or change their own body.
A student who studies hard; a swot .
A person who coaches students for an upcoming examination .
A hard-working, physical player with limited offensive ability.
A low-ranking attorney with no clients who works very hard.
An outdoor space for drills and parades .
Atmospheric interference producing a roaring background noise .

main_definition: One who grinds something, such as the teeth.
secondary_definitions: Any of various machines or devices that grind things, such as by grinding them down or grinding them up .
( Northern US , especially Connecticut , Vermont ) A submarine sandwich , a sandwich made on a long, cylindrical roll.
A kitchen gadget for processing coffee, herbs etc. into small or powdered pieces.
The restless flycatcher ( Myiagra inquieta ) of Australia , which makes a noise like a scissors grinder.
( music , slang ) A fan or performer of grindcore music .
( slang ) A biohacker who uses cybernetic implants or biochemicals to enhance or change their own body.
( slang , dated ) A student who studies hard; a swot .
( slang , dated ) A person who coaches students for an upcoming examination .
( ice hockey , slang ) A hard-working, physical player with limited offensive ability.
( lawyer slang ) A low-ranking attorney with no clients who works very hard.
( US , military , slang ) An outdoor space for drills and parades .
( radio , informal ) Atmospheric interference producing a roaring background noise .
